name: Anchor & Ore (Inside Delta Hotel)
text:
Classics
Oatmeal
$10.00
brown sugar, raisins, almonds

Bonvoy Continental
$13.00
fresh fruit, yogurt parfait with honey, granola, berry Compote, choice of croissant, danish or muffin, coffee, tea or juice

Housemade Waffle*
$15.00
with whipped topping, fresh berries, choice of maple syrup or fruit compote, choice of bacon, ham or breakfast sausage

Superior Breakfast*
$16.50
two eggs, breakfast potatoes, toast, choice of bacon, ham, breakfast sausage

Hungryman
$19.50
Three Egg Omelet*
$17.50
(whole or egg white), breakfast potatoes, toast, choice of tomato, onion, red pepper, spinach, mushroom, ham, bacon, Swiss, goat cheese or cheddar cheese

Eggs Benedict
$17.00
Two poached eggs, English muffin, breakfast Potatoes, hollandaise sauce, peameal bacon, smoked paprika. Children's Miracle Network Hospital; Hotel will donate $1 for every Eggs Benedict purchased

Smoked Salmon Dill
$19.00
Signature
Apple Crisp Pancakes
$16.50
3 pancakes topped with whipped apple butter, Apple crisp topping and served with Apple maple syrup, choice of bacon, ham or sausage

North Western Skillet*
$22.00
two eggs, bacon & sausage, breakfast potatoes, Pico de Gallo Salsa, mixed cheese, green onions, Foyot sauce

Caprese Avocado Toast
$23.00
multigrain bread, two poached eggs, avocado spread, crispy avocado, Pico de Gallo, mozzarella, fresh basil, balsamic glaze with a side sliced fruit

A & O Breakfast Taco
$17.00
3-6in flour tortillas, scrambled eggs, Pico de Gallo, Bacon or sausage, mixed cheese, fresh Cilantro, breakfast potatoes

Sides
Bacon | Sausage | Ham
$7.00
Cold Cereal
$6.00
Fruit Bowl with Berries
$7.00
Toast
$6.00

Start Here
Burrata Salad
$24.00
burrata cheese, mixed greens, asparagus, cherry tomatoes, Kalamata olives, balsamic, extra virgin olive oil

Vegan A&O Salad
$19.00
fresh kale, tofu, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, sweet corn, quinoa, black beans, lime mint dressing

Caesar Salad
$18.00
romaine hearts, lemon, garlic croutons, parmesan cheese, smoked bacon, Caesar dressing

Traditional Poutine
$15.00
fries, cheese curds, gravy, green onions

Chicken Wings (10 PCS)
$22.00
maple chili sauce, buffalo hot sauce, salt & pepper served with celery and ranch dressing *Vegetarian wings available, please ask your server

Big Plate
A&O Fish & Chips
$27.00
Sleeping Giant Skull Rock batter, haddock, coleslaw, fries, lemon, tartar sauce

Puttanesca Shrimp Linguine
$32.00
shrimp, tomatoes, kalamata olives, capers, garlic, parmesan *You may substitute shrimp for chicken

Cajun Chicken Tenders
$24.00
chicken strips breaded, fries, coleslaw, maple chili sauce

Handhelds
ALL HANDHELDS ARE SERVED WITH CHOICE OF FRIES OR HOUSE SALAD.

Thunder Bird Burger
$25.00
prime rib patty 100% Canadian beef, pulled pork, smoked gouda, citrus red cabbage slaw, crispy onions, A&O signature sauce, blueberry BBQ sauce, on a sesame brioche bun

Chicken BBQ Flatbread
$22.00

Fish Taco

San Sebastian Cheesecake
$16.00

$14.00
homemade ice cream cake on a flavored cookie crust

Crème Brûlée
$14.00
creamy custard base topped with caramelized sugar

Vegan Chocolate Cake
$14.00
served with mixed berry compote

sliced artisanal meats, hard and soft cheese, pickles,nuts, chutney, local honey and crackers

100% Local Natural Canadian Ribeye Steak 10 Oz

100% AAA Grass Fed Top Sirloin Steak 8 Oz
$48.00
peppercorn demi - served with one starch and one side option

From the Smoker
All smoked meats are Ontario sourced and smoked in house using combination of cherry and hickory wood. Served with one starch and one side option. Includes pickles and our A&O BBQ sauce

St Louis Ribs 1/2 Rack
$29.00
fresh 100% Ontario pork side rib

Beef Brisket
$32.00
AAA fresh, Canadian sustainable beef

Handhelds
All handhelds are served with choice of fries or house salad

$25.00

$22.00

$24.00

$19.00

Soup of the Day
Ask About Our Soup of the Day
$10.00
Chef's fresh homemade soup

Cocktails
A&O Signature
Vanilla Vodka, Amaretto, Cranberry, Orange, Apple

Honey Do
Honey Jasmine Syrup, Rock Melon Cantaloupe Syrup, Black Tea, Lemonade

Gin Spritz
Gin, Bitter Orange Syrup, Club Soda

Spicy Margarita
Silver Tequila, Orange Liqueur, Spiced Grapefruit Lime Elixir

Cast Away
White Rum, Blue Curacao Liqueur, Coconut Syrup, Fresh Lime Juice

Green Tea Collins
Gin, Cocoa Nib Vanilla Green Tea Elixir, Club Soda

Cold Spirit
Bourbon, Benedictine Liqueur, Vanilla Syrup

Mojito
